tourGuide.service

Class RewardsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • tourGuide.service.RewardsService

  • @Service
public class RewardsService
extends java.lang.Object
    RewardsService interfaces with RewardCentral and performs associated tasks for main TourGuide application

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RewardsService(GpsService gpsService, rewardCentral.RewardCentral rewardCentral, UserService userService) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateRewards(User user)
      Calculate rewards for a provided User Checks all user's VisitedLocations, compares each to list of Attractions from GpsService If a user has visited an attraction (ie visited location is in range of an attraction) Add reward to user for that attraction if they have not already received a reward for it
      java.lang.String calculateRewardsReturn(User user)
      Calculate rewards for a provided User Checks all user's VisitedLocations, compares each to list of Attractions from GpsService If a user has visited an attraction (ie visited location is in range of an attraction) Add reward to user for that attraction if they have not already received a reward for it
      int getRewardValue(gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction, java.util.UUID userid)
      Get Reward Point value of an attraction for a user
      boolean isWithinAttractionProximity(gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction, gpsUtil.location.Location location)
      Check if a provided Location is within range of an Attraction
      void setDefaultProximityBuffer()
      Set the Proximity Buffer back to it's default value, as stored in defaultProximityBuffer
      void setProximityBuffer(int proximityBuffer)
      Set a value for the Proximity Buffer This controls how close a user's location has to be to an Attraction to gain rewards

                                           gpsUtil.location.Location location)
        Check if a provided Location is within range of an Attraction
        Parameters:
        attraction - attraction to be checked
        location - location to be compared to
        Returns:
        true if location is within range, otherwise false

      • calculateRewards

        public void calculateRewards(User user)
        Calculate rewards for a provided User Checks all user's VisitedLocations, compares each to list of Attractions from GpsService If a user has visited an attraction (ie visited location is in range of an attraction) Add reward to user for that attraction if they have not already received a reward for it
        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
